thread.section_title: American Freight Furniture & Mattress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Freight Furniture & Mattress | americanfreight.us | 3 of 79
thread.title: JT
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by JT

author: JT
title: JT
text: Ok I like buying from Craigslist for barely used items. When I visited the store for the first time I couldn't believe the low prices for a good quality bunk bed plus they had reasonable prices on NEW mattresses that fit these beds. So I paid for the delivery and set up which was fast since the grandkids were arriving the next day. The only drawback is no warranty and no return but Craigslist is the same for a used item.
